About

RagamBahasa is part of “research collaboration starting in 2022” that focuses on the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP). RagamBahasa is a ‘home’ for collaborator/contributor of Indonesian local language resources to work together to preserve local languages through digitizing analog resources (newspapaer, magazine, manuscript, books, etc) of Indonesian local language. In its development, RagamBahasa also supports efforts to collect local language resources in digital form that are widely distributed on the internet, so that they can be easily found when needed.

Contact Us

Have questions or want to learn more about RagamBahasa? Feel free to reach out to us at ragambahasa.ace@gmail.com.

Thank you for coming to RagamBahasa.
We look forward to collaborate with you, together preserve Indonesian local languages!
